Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; dot and billet pattern in added white between white lines; below, chain of white lotus buds with small buds in the interstices with added red centres; below, dot and billet band; exterior: dot band between pairs of dilute lines; two dilute lines at bottom of sherd.
Curator's comments: The number '864' is written in pencil on the exterior surface.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 306, no. 1218)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1961) (phase 2)
